title: Some issue you might have about TCM
text: We understand that you might have some questions about TCM and we try to reply all FAQs here!

section.title: Is it safe?
section.content: Yes! TCM in Singapore is safe as all practitioners are required to be registered with the Traditional Chinese Medicine Practitioners Board (TCMPB) and follow a high standard of hygiene and sterilisation practices.

section.title: Is there any data to back it up?
section.content: There has been a rise in evidence-based medical research in TCM (DOI -> 10.1111/jebm.12420).
